Westpac NZ - Tech Area Lead – Mobile - Full-time - Auckland/Wellington, New Zealand - https://westpacnz.wd105.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/Westpac_Care…

We are looking for a Senior IT expert to lead engineering delivery, capacity management, coordination, cost management, and the technology roadmap for Westpac Digital’s Mobile team. This role includes WFH flexibility (2-3 days a week), 10% superannuation, and banking benefits.

Requirements: 8+ years in mobile/full-stack engineering, proven cost management, stakeholder engagement, and leadership skills. Experience with complex mobile applications and financial arrangements is essential.
